entry.title: See first Covid-19 vaccine given to a New York health care worker

media:group.media:title: See first Covid-19 vaccine given to a New York health care worker
media:group.media:description: New York state vaccinated their first health care worker during a livestream organized by Gov. Andrew Cuomo. The Pfizer-BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine was administered to critical care nurse Sandra who shared a message of hope after the injection. #CNN #News

entry.title: GOP lawmaker stripped of committee assignments over protest remarks

media:group.media:title: GOP lawmaker stripped of committee assignments over protest remarks
media:group.media:description: "Credible threats of violence" have prompted Michigan authorities to close the state capitol to the public and shutter House and Senate offices, a spokeswoman said, on the day the Electoral College will formally declare Joe Biden the President-elect. #CNN #News

entry.title: Pfizer CEO explains why he hasn't received a vaccine yet

media:group.media:title: Pfizer CEO explains why he hasn't received a vaccine yet
media:group.media:description: Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla speaks with CNN's Sanjay Gupta as the company prepares to roll out doses of the Pfizer-BioNTech Covid-19 vaccines in the US. #CNN #News

entry.title: Ilhan Omar on status of Covid-19 stimulus bill

media:group.media:title: Ilhan Omar on status of Covid-19 stimulus bill
media:group.media:description: Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-MN) discusses the impacts of a Covid-19 stimulus bill being hung up in court, and if a two-part proposal is the solution. #CNN #News

entry.title: Stelter: This was Fox News' biggest story last week

media:group.media:title: Stelter: This was Fox News' biggest story last week
media:group.media:description: CNN's Brian Stelter argues that Fox News' coverage of the federal probe into Hunter Biden's tax affairs was disproportionate compared to their coverage of other topics, such as the coronavirus pandemic.

entry.title: FDA commissioner's advice on taking the vaccine if you have allergies

media:group.media:title: FDA commissioner's advice on taking the vaccine if you have allergies
media:group.media:description: FDA Commissioner Stephen Hahn spoke to CNN's Jake Tapper about Pfizer's coronavirus vaccine as the first batch was shipped out across the US. Hahn advised Americans with allergies to read the vaccine's product labeling on the FDA's website to check for any components that might cause an allergic reaction.

entry.title: Tapper asks Gates when he thinks we'll be back to 'normal.' Hear his response

media:group.media:title: Tapper asks Gates when he thinks we'll be back to 'normal.' Hear his response
media:group.media:description: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, whose foundation has been part of the effort to develop and deliver Covid-19 vaccines, said the presidential transition is "complicating" efforts to distribute one. #CNN #News

entry.title: Jake Tapper wants to thank Trump. Hear why

media:group.media:title: Jake Tapper wants to thank Trump. Hear why
media:group.media:description: CNN's Jake Tapper lists the ways in which President Donald Trump's presidency helped bring to light issues with our political system. #CNN #News

entry.title: Smerconish: The Supreme Court comes up short

media:group.media:title: Smerconish: The Supreme Court comes up short
media:group.media:description: CNN's Michael Smerconish argues that President Trump was always going to lose the Texas lawsuit challenging President-elect Biden's win, but the Supreme Court did not go far enough in its explanation why.

entry.title: FDA authorizes Pfizer and BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine for emergency use

media:group.media:title: FDA authorizes Pfizer and BioNTech's Covid-19 vaccine for emergency use
media:group.media:description:
The US Food and Drug Administration has authorized Pfizer and BioNTech's coronavirus vaccine for emergency use in the United States. CNN's Chris Cuomo, Dr. Sanjay Gupta and Dr. Leana Wen discuss.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Supreme Court rejects Trump's bid to overturn election

media:group.media:title: Supreme Court rejects Trump's bid to overturn election
media:group.media:description:
The Supreme Court acted with unusual speed to reject a bid from Texas' attorney general — supported by President Donald Trump — to block the ballots of millions of voters in battleground states that went in favor of President-elect Joe Biden. CNN's Jessica Schneider has the details.
#CNN #News

entry.title: White House tells FDA chief to approve vaccine or resign

media:group.media:title: White House tells FDA chief to approve vaccine or resign
media:group.media:description:
White House chief of staff Mark Meadows told Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Dr. Stephen Hahn he needed to grant an emergency use authorization for Pfizer/BioNTech's coronavirus vaccine by the end of Friday, and if not, he needs to resign, an administration official and a source familiar with the situation tell CNN.
#CNN #News

entry.title: GOP congressman to Republicans: What is going on?

media:group.media:title: GOP congressman to Republicans: What is going on?
media:group.media:description:
Congressman Denver Riggleman, an outgoing Republican from Virginia, condemned the "contagion of disinformation" and criticized members of his party who supported an unprecedented lawsuit seeking to overturn President Donald Trump's election defeat despite there being no evidence of widespread fraud.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Cooper: Here's what this vain and selfish man is now doing

media:group.media:title: Cooper: Here's what this vain and selfish man is now doing
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Anderson Cooper breaks down the various efforts by President Trump and the GOP to overturn the election results.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Biden's economic plan is bold. Is it possible?

media:group.media:title: Biden's economic plan is bold. Is it possible?
media:group.media:description:
President-Elect Joe Biden has sketched out a bold economic agenda, but his ability to enact it could be determined by the upcoming races for control of the Senate.
Produced by Sean Clark Senior Producers: Logan Whiteside & Bronte Lord
#CNN #Business #JoeBiden
